content.body:
annevk: 

1. `//origin-a/` is an isolated page.
1. Navigates to `//origin-a/2` - another isolated page. This uses the same BCG as the previous page.
1. Navigates to `//origin-a/3` - another isolated page. However this page also includes `Content-Security-Policy: sandbox`. Does it use the same BCG?

annevk:

  3. Navigates to //origin-a/3 - another isolated page. However this page also includes Content-Security-Policy: sandbox. Does it use the same BCG?
